name: admin
title: Admin Reports API
description: Fetches reports for the administrators of G Suite customers about the usage, collaboration, security, and risk for their users.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.desc: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

parameters.name: key
parameters.desc: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

parameters.name: oauth_token
parameters.desc: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

parameters.name: prettyPrint
parameters.desc: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

parameters.name: quotaUser
parameters.desc: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

parameters.name: userIp
parameters.desc: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.

schemas.name: Channel
schemas.desc: An notification channel used to watch for resource changes.

fields.name: resourceUri
fields.desc: A version-specific identifier for the watched resource.

fields.name: expiration
fields.desc: Date and time of notification channel expiration, expressed as a Unix timestamp, in milliseconds. Optional.

fields.name: params
fields.desc: Additional parameters controlling delivery channel behavior. Optional.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Identifies this as a notification channel used to watch for changes to a resource. Value: the fixed string "api#channel".

fields.name: payload
fields.desc: A Boolean value to indicate whether payload is wanted. Optional.

fields.name: resourceId
fields.desc: An opaque ID that identifies the resource being watched on this channel. Stable across different API versions.

fields.name: token
fields.desc: An arbitrary string delivered to the target address with each notification delivered over this channel. Optional.

fields.name: type
fields.desc: The type of delivery mechanism used for this channel.

fields.name: address
fields.desc: The address where notifications are delivered for this channel.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: A UUID or similar unique string that identifies this channel.

schemas.name: UsageReport
schemas.desc: JSON template for a usage report.

fields.name: date
fields.desc: The date to which the record belongs.

fields.name: entity
fields.desc: Information about the type of the item.

fields.name: customerId
fields.desc: Obfuscated customer id for the record.

fields.name: profileId
fields.desc: Obfuscated user id for the record.

fields.name: type
fields.desc: The type of item, can be a customer or user.

fields.name: userEmail
fields.desc: user's email.

fields.name: etag
fields.desc: ETag of the resource.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: The kind of object.

fields.name: parameters
fields.desc: Parameter value pairs for various applications.

fields.name: msgValue
fields.desc: Nested message value of the parameter.

fields.name: name
fields.desc: The name of the parameter.

fields.name: stringValue
fields.desc: String value of the parameter.

fields.name: boolValue
fields.desc: Boolean value of the parameter.

fields.name: datetimeValue
fields.desc: RFC 3339 formatted value of the parameter.

fields.name: intValue
fields.desc: Integral value of the parameter.

schemas.name: UsageReports
schemas.desc: JSON template for a collection of usage reports.

fields.name: etag
fields.desc: ETag of the resource.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: The kind of object.

fields.name: nextPageToken
fields.desc: Token for retrieving the next page

fields.name: usageReports
fields.desc: Various application parameter records.

fields.name: warnings
fields.desc: Warnings if any.

fields.name: code
fields.desc: Machine readable code / warning type.

fields.name: data
fields.desc: Key-Value pairs to give detailed information on the warning.

fields.name: key
fields.desc: Key associated with a key-value pair to give detailed information on the warning.

fields.name: value
fields.desc: Value associated with a key-value pair to give detailed information on the warning.

fields.name: message
fields.desc: Human readable message for the warning.

schemas.name: Activities
schemas.desc: JSON template for a collection of activites.

fields.name: items
fields.desc: Each record in read response.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Kind of list response this is.

fields.name: nextPageToken
fields.desc: Token for retrieving the next page

fields.name: etag
fields.desc: ETag of the resource.

schemas.name: Activity
schemas.desc: JSON template for the activity resource.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Kind of resource this is.

fields.name: ownerDomain
fields.desc: Domain of source customer.

fields.name: actor
fields.desc: User doing the action.

fields.name: key
fields.desc: For OAuth 2LO API requests, consumer_key of the requestor.

fields.name: profileId
fields.desc: Obfuscated user id of the user.

fields.name: callerType
fields.desc: User or OAuth 2LO request.

fields.name: email
fields.desc: Email address of the user.

fields.name: etag
fields.desc: ETag of the entry.

fields.name: events
fields.desc: Activity events.

fields.name: name
fields.desc: Name of event.

fields.name: parameters
fields.desc: Parameter value pairs for various applications.

fields.name: boolValue
fields.desc: Boolean value of the parameter.

fields.name: intValue
fields.desc: Integral value of the parameter.

fields.name: multiIntValue
fields.desc: Multi-int value of the parameter.

fields.name: multiValue
fields.desc: Multi-string value of the parameter.

fields.name: name
fields.desc: The name of the parameter.

fields.name: value
fields.desc: String value of the parameter.

fields.name: type
fields.desc: Type of event.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: Unique identifier for each activity record.

fields.name: applicationName
fields.desc: Application name to which the event belongs.

fields.name: customerId
fields.desc: Obfuscated customer ID of the source customer.

fields.name: time
fields.desc: Time of occurrence of the activity.

fields.name: uniqueQualifier
fields.desc: Unique qualifier if multiple events have the same time.

fields.name: ipAddress
fields.desc: IP Address of the user doing the action.

methods.name: list
methods.desc: Retrieves a list of activities for a specific customer and application.

pathParams.name: userKey
pathParams.desc: Represents the profile id or the user email for which the data should be filtered. When 'all' is specified as the userKey, it returns usageReports for all users.

pathParams.name: applicationName
pathParams.desc: Application name for which the events are to be retrieved.

optinalQueryParams.name: maxResults
optinalQueryParams.desc: Number of activity records to be shown in each page.

optinalQueryParams.name: startTime
optinalQueryParams.desc: Return events which occurred at or after this time.

optinalQueryParams.name: customerId
optinalQueryParams.desc: Represents the customer for which the data is to be fetched.

optinalQueryParams.name: endTime
optinalQueryParams.desc: Return events which occurred at or before this time.

optinalQueryParams.name: filters
optinalQueryParams.desc: Event parameters in the form [parameter1 name][operator][parameter1 value],[parameter2 name][operator][parameter2 value],...

optinalQueryParams.name: pageToken
optinalQueryParams.desc: Token to specify next page.

optinalQueryParams.name: actorIpAddress
optinalQueryParams.desc: IP Address of host where the event was performed. Supports both IPv4 and IPv6 addresses.

optinalQueryParams.name: eventName
optinalQueryParams.desc: Name of the event being queried.

pathParams.name: applicationName

optinalQueryParams.name: customerId
optinalQueryParams.desc: Represents the customer for which the data is to be fetched.

methods.name: stop
methods.desc: Stop watching resources through this channel

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Retrieves a report which is a collection of properties / statistics for a specific customer.

pathParams.name: date
pathParams.desc: Represents the date in yyyy-mm-dd format for which the data is to be fetched.

optinalQueryParams.name: pageToken
optinalQueryParams.desc: Token to specify next page.

optinalQueryParams.name: parameters
optinalQueryParams.desc: Represents the application name, parameter name pairs to fetch in csv as app_name1:param_name1, app_name2:param_name2.

optinalQueryParams.name: customerId
optinalQueryParams.desc: Represents the customer for which the data is to be fetched.

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Retrieves a report which is a collection of properties / statistics for a set of users.

pathParams.name: userKey
pathParams.desc: Represents the profile id or the user email for which the data should be filtered.

pathParams.name: date
pathParams.desc: Represents the date in yyyy-mm-dd format for which the data is to be fetched.

optinalQueryParams.name: filters
optinalQueryParams.desc: Represents the set of filters including parameter operator value.

optinalQueryParams.name: maxResults
optinalQueryParams.desc: Maximum number of results to return. Maximum allowed is 1000

optinalQueryParams.name: pageToken
optinalQueryParams.desc: Token to specify next page.

optinalQueryParams.name: parameters
optinalQueryParams.desc: Represents the application name, parameter name pairs to fetch in csv as app_name1:param_name1, app_name2:param_name2.

optinalQueryParams.name: customerId
optinalQueryParams.desc: Represents the customer for which the data is to be fetched.
